problem.markdown:
Which of the qualities below denote if a type of memory is ranked higher on the memory hierarchy? [x] Faster [x] Less of it in your laptop [x] More expensive [x] Smaller
[explanation] If something is ranked higher on the memory hiearchy, it is considered to be faster, smaller, and therefore, more expensive. To make computers more financially avialable, companies include less of the fastest memory in computers. The ratio of different types of memory is intended to balance size, weight, and speed to give the appearance of small, light, fast, and reasonably priced. [explanation]
